verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm singing wonderful, wonderful,
Everyday, in this way,
Wonderful, wonderful is He.
For He has rescued me, set me free,
Lifted me, gloriously,
Wonderful, wonderful is He.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For I've come out of the valley where
The darkness abounds.
And I'm up on the mountain where the glory is found.
This is my song, all day long, in the night, through the fight,
Wonderful, wonderful is He.
